comments.content: **[Fat Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180223/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Fat%20Face%20-%20Regular&fid=76c1aad8933b7c28b44f58a28558a087&fsize=60&text=COPEN%20HAGEN%20FASHION%20WEEK&wrap=2)** once available by Image Club Graphics & ITC, now available from URW++
